website_summaries.verdict: A great finishing touch to your restored golf cart or upgrade to existing cart.
pros: Get a bigger rim and keep the 18-inch diameter you need for your golf cart
You won't need a lift kit for these high-end, quality, tough, very good-looking tires
Come aired up and ready to install
Will be a big improvement over your factory-installed tires
cons: Low-profile tires might make your ride a little less smooth over rough terrain

customer_reviews.title: TIRES wore out within 31 days- i mean flat wore out! not sure why!
customer_reviews.text: my tires/ wheels are 37 days old and the front have worn down to smooth "NO TREAD" on one tire and the other is worn inside tread. . My cart front end was aligned the same time as tire installation. I am needing your input on the warranty or replacement of the tires. I am attaching a picture of each front tire for your inspection. I ask for your analysis and assistance on this issue. I tried to add photos, but this site would not let me!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rims and tires and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wheels and tires and a good price. Customer service follow up for correct lug nuts and shipping was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and function for our stock Club Car
customer_reviews.text: This rim and tire combo made our stock 2012 Club Car look awesome! We're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about previous review
customer_reviews.text: A previous reviewer showed bald tires after only 4 weeks of use. Have no idea how this could be possible unless they were doing a lot of drifting with their golf cart. These have been on my cart for about 6 weeks or so...Granted my cart gets light use running around the neighborhood, however, I’ve seen zero wear on my tires as the previous reviewer noted.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional seller
customer_reviews.text: All around five star service and product. Tires are just as pictured/advertised. Only issue was wrong lug nuts (could’ve been my fault in the ordering process) but seller sent out the correct ones within minutes of reading my email, which made for one happy husband!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT looks!
customer_reviews.text: These wheels look GREAT on my stock EZGO TXT cart. They're a HUGE improvement. Arrived as described: mounted, inflated, and ready to roll!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Rims ... Many Compliments ... Fast Ship ... Perfect Fit on Non Lifted EZ-GO Golf Cart ...
customer_reviews.author: Donbdaone

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: These tires are awesome! They really dress up the cart and the tread although not off road has a nice track to purchase dirt or asphalt. Absolutely no issues with installation and the added bonus was a follow up from the supplier (cart king) to confirm all was well. I 110% approve these tires and supplier. You won’t be disappointed 👍
customer_reviews.author: Paul s.

customer_reviews.title: Great set and look awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the look they give our golf cart. Smoother ride and better traction than expected. Great customer service is always nice to see. They made sure we had the right lug nuts and we're very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ws

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: These wheels complement my newly restored golf cart. Cart rides great with these new wheels and tires. Great deal compared to my local golf cart dealer.
customer_reviews.author: DK3699

customer_reviews.title: Great traction.
customer_reviews.text: I can now take it to river and not get stick with these on my cart. Great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel set
customer_reviews.text: Love these wheels. I did a ton of research and these seemed like the right fit for our cart. There's really nothing to the installation process - it's nothing more than changing a car tire. My only suggestion is to check the pressure. They came with 30psi but personally I think that's a bit much and usually run 18-20psi. The price was right and they really helped dress our cart up.
customer_reviews.author: dexter holliday

customer_reviews.title: Product and seller - total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Update: after repeated attempts to contact and work with the seller on these tires, I am left with a defective product and no recourse. In less than 6 months, tires are completely bald and need to be replaced. Complete waste of money. Hello, have tried repeated times to contact you following my initial message in August, but emails are not going through. My front tires are completely bald after only 60 days of use. I have the photos you requested but they are being clocked. Please contact me ASAP to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hodelka

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: By far the best price on rims and tires for a golf cart out there. They went on super easy no lift kit required
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price, easy install
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, the tires came already inflated, and ready to put on my old E-Z-GO TXT. The lug nuts were perfect and within an hour, all four tires were on and looking good. Also, the shipping was free and super fast. So far, the tires are holding up well on asphalt, dirt and wooded trails.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessLucy

customer_reviews.title: Like them but 6 of lug nuts didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the wheels. They rubbed on my golf carts brake caliper so I didn't like that. I also couldn't fit the SS in the middle on my front wheels because of them having disc brakes instead of drum brakes. But ultimately got them to work. I'm still mad they told me they'd get me the lug nuts I need and then never took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: .FANWV

customer_reviews.title: Check the pressure before you install
customer_reviews.text: The tires and wheels seem to be good quality. Two of the tires came with over 60 lbs of air and two around 30 lbs. On small tires like this it makes a difference in the circumference of the tire so be sure the pressure is the same before you install. One other thing is the center hubs will not seat on the front wheels. You will need to cut a gasket spacer to install on the back of the center hub unless you want to hear it clicking as they flop when you drive.
customer_reviews.author: John Vance

customer_reviews.title: A good value for a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wheels, a great looking product. The wheels and tires give my cart a very smooth ride. Received many fine comments about how they made my cart look.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, packaging was okay, not very protective, but everything was fine with the product. They look awesome and really dress up my 2011 Club Car Precedent. The ride is smoother and handles great. The install was simple, however the SS hubs for the front wheels would not stay on, I had to remove the spring clips for the front hub covers to get them to fit⚓️⚓️🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking.
customer_reviews.text: Enhances the look of my white DS. Installed quickly with electric impact wrench. Appears to be good quality. Quality will become more apparent with use. Came with center caps attached. One cap was loose, but it popped back on securely.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal! Arrived quickly and as promised...full of air and at the correct psi for our golf car.

customer_reviews.text: These are high quality wheels and tires that come ready to go with good lug nuts. I would definitely buy again. They look great on our EZGO. No mods required.

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: Great package deal with all included hardware. Really dresses up a cart and was hundreds less than my local golf cart shops or chain tire stores. Highly recommended and easy to install. Bolted right on to by 2017 EzGo TxT. Shipping was fast and a week ahead of schedule. Already recommended them to my father in law for his cart.

customer_reviews.text: Great looking wheels and tires! Customer service is top notch. If you are putting on a Yamaha, be sure to request metric lug nuts.

customer_reviews.title: Great style, ride and value

customer_reviews.title: Be assured from sellers that the product is a match
customer_reviews.text: Looked good but 4 don’t fit on my 2015 EZGO 2five as advertised. Delayed Delivery beyond the Amazon window & notified me I was due a refund. Tires are great, lugs match up but wheels don’t match up with wheel mounts causing metal on metal to grind. Must return.
customer_reviews.author: kalle

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong here!

customer_reviews.title: Center cap rattle on rear wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall. They arrived ahead of scheduled delivery date. The only down side is the center caps for the rear of my 2013 Ezgo are loose even the the O-rings in place. There is a shallow recess in the rear drums where caps do not set flush and rattle. Other than that I am happy with the wheels and tires. Maybe a second O-ring would solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: RDP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install without raising

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The tires on my golf cart were old and cracked. I decided to go ahead and upgrade the wheels as well. What a difference, it looks like a different buggy now. Well worth it and easy to install. I've run these for a season now, and the ride and handling are much improved.

product_meta.title: 10" VAMPIRE Machined/Black GOLF CART WHEELS AND 205/50-10 LOW PROFILE GOLF CART TIRES COMBO - SET OF 4
product_meta.description:
Aggressive and high-end, two words that are very accurate in describing the popular 10" VAMPIRE golf cart wheels and 205/50-10 DOT Approved Street Tire combo. These wheels are extremely tough, and are only done true justice when seen in person. 

We wrap our mean Machined/ Black VAMPIRE golf cart wheels in high-performing 205/50-10" DOT Approved Low Profile Golf Cart tires (4 comfortable inches of sidewall!) to create the ultimate 10" Wheel and Tire combo that will allow you to zip around with no limits! 

Our 10" VAMPIRE combo includes:
- (4) Fresh 205/50-10 DOT Approved Low Profile Golf Cart tires
- (4) Brand new 10"x7" VAMPIRE Machined/ Black Aluminum wheels
- (4) Center Caps (chrome)
- (4) Sets of Lug Nuts (chrome)

TECH SPECS: 
Tire size: 205/50-10
DOT Rated: YES 
TURF safe: YES 
Tire height (ground to top of tire): 18 inches
Ply Rating: 4 ply 
Wheel Offset: 3+4 (3" back, 4" front)
Bolt Pattern: 4x4 (101.6mm) 

These assemblies mount on any stock Golf Cart hub and any UTV, or Trailer hub that is 4 bolt and measures 4x4" (4x101.6mm measured diagonally)
feature_bullets: Includes: (4) New 205/50-10 Low Profile DOT Approved tires (4) 10"x7" Vampire Black/Machined wheels (4) SS Chrome Center Caps (4) Sets of Chrome Lug Nuts
This wheel and tire combo measures 18 inches in diameter
Low Profile DOT Approved tire tread
Come mounted and aired up to the proper pressure

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars347 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
